article_title: Health author Patrick plans health care talk
article_text: Author of Health Attitude John Patrick will give a talk at the Ridgefield Playhouse on Sunday, May 1, at 5:30. He will introduces the latest advances in technology that are revolutionizing health care during the Obamacare era, from smart phone apps to 3D printers. The talk is part of HamletHub’s A Whole New You Series and Moffly Media’s Entertaining Conversation series. Tickets ($30 includes a signed copy of his book) call or visit the box office at 203-438-5795 or go online at ridgefieldplayhouse.org
